summary: Completed testing navigation highlighting functionality after fixes to sidebar navigation. All navigation items properly highlight when active, and parent navigation items remain highlighted for child routes (e.g., Trips highlighted when on /trips/:id)
passed_tests: Login functionality with admin@servex.com works correctly
Navigation to /trips page - Trips nav item highlighted correctly
Navigation to /parcels/intake page - Parcel Intake nav item highlighted correctly
Navigation to /warehouse page - Warehouse nav item highlighted correctly
Navigation to /clients page - Clients nav item highlighted correctly
Trip detail page navigation (/trips/:id) - Trips nav item remains highlighted on child route
isNavItemActive helper function correctly identifies active navigation states
URL navigation works properly for all tested routes
